ygData.subject: Re: Giant fire beetle?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well many have posted on this but sadly a few comments are wrong. Unless they changed this quest, a giant fire beetle leg comes from the Queen Klackniks. These
ygData.messageBody:
Well many have posted on this but sadly a few comments are wrong. Unless
they changed this quest, a giant fire beetle leg comes from the Queen
Klackniks. These can be found near Qeynos or Rivervale newbie areas. It is a
rare spawn. It is quite tough for newbies though, i suggest at least level
10-12 before doing it if not higher. been a long time since I killed one.

The beetles in karana are called Giant Beetles and DO NOT drop the items you
are looking for.

----- Original Message -----
From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 12:08 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Giant fire beetle?


>From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
>
>I am pretty sure I saw giant fire beetles in one of
>the Karena zones(East or West). I seem to recall they
>were about level 10 or so, but it has been a long
>while since I fought within that level.
>
>Belgarth Wolfstrider
>
>--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
>> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>>
>> I don't think Giant Fire Beetles exist. Someone in
>> my guild asked that and
>> I've never seen em. I've seen Fire Beetles, and
>> Giant Beetles, but not Giant
>> Fire Beetles. If they do exist, it's on one of the
>> outlying islands, not on
>> the main continent (I've been everywhere but
>> Cazith-Thule and the
>> "evil-race" towns).
>>
>> -----Original Message-----

>> what level are they?
>> Ken
